hook.text: Half the world's 50 most valuable tech companies were founded within 50 miles of Stanford University.

buildup.text: Innovation ecosystems combine universities, venture capital, talent, culture, and infrastructure in one geography.

discovery.text: Silicon Valley's secret: tolerance for failure. Bankruptcy is a learning experience, not a career-ender.
